Name: Base
Desc: Baseline. All times with a * are an average of 10 measurements. Sample size 16.

Name: Consts
Desc: Replaced offset literals with named constants.

Name: Half
Desc: Only process forward neighbours, and register both A->B and B->A

Name: Sep1
Desc: Separated corners, edge, & center. But no change to validations, so no boost expected.
